arts.ttl: FPL GW4 stats: Managers left frustrated by Joao Pedro
arts.sum: More than 1.3million Fantasy Premier League managers were left ruing their luck as Gameweek 4's most-bought player, Joao Pedro (£5.7m), frustrated his new owners. It's the second successive Gameweek that the No 1 transfer target has blanked, following Noni Madueke's (£6.6m) two points at home to Crystal Palace in the last round.

arts.ttl: Ipswich Town: Alex Jones' player ratings from Brighton draw
arts.oTtl: East Anglican Daily Times - Ispwich Town FC
arts.sum: A couple of good runs up against Jack Hinshelwood but struggled to find space to do damage against Brighton's back line. Got into good areas and held the ball up the pitch when Brighton were looking for a winner.

arts.ttl: Ipswich Town: Kieran McKenna on Brighton draw and Arijanet Muric
arts.oTtl: East Anglican Daily Times - Ispwich Town FC
arts.sum: Goalkeeper Arijanet Muric was arguably the hero of the match, making six saves to shut out Brighton while showing a strong level of dominance in his box. I’m sure that we’ll improve over the course of time as this group comes together, adapts to each other and the level, but while we’re doing that, showing the spirit and the fight that we showed today to get a clean sheet against a very good side is a step forward.”

arts.ttl: Kieran McKenna was never worried about selecting keeper Arijanet Muric
arts.sum: The stopper helped Town to a point at Brighton.

arts.ttl: Brighton 0-0 Ipswich: Highlights, man of the match, stats
arts.sum: Ipswich Town claim their first Premier League away point of the season after holding Brighton & Hove Albion to a 0-0 draw at the Amex Stadium on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Arijanet Muric goes from zero to hero to Ipswich earn a point at Brighton
arts.sum: The goalkeeper has had an up and down week.

arts.ttl: Valiant Ipswich hold Brighton in stalemate
arts.sum: Ipswich valiantly held high-flying Brighton to a goalless draw at the Amex Stadium - and were inches away from their first Premier League win as Liam Delap struck the post in the second half.

arts.ttl: Brighton player ratings vs Ipswich Town as midfield ace scores 9 and ex-Leeds United star debuts
arts.sum: Brighton and Hove Albion were held to a 0-0 draw by newly-promoted Ipswich Town at the Amex Stadium in the Premier League

arts.ttl: Arijanet Muric stars as Ipswich earn a point at Brighton
arts.sum: The goalkeeper has had an up and down week.

arts.ttl: Joao Pedro absence explained for Brighton vs Ipswich as bold decision made on ex-Leeds United ace
arts.sum: All the latest team news for Brighton and Hove Albion and across the Premier League
